name: Alpha Man v Angry Girlfriend (2 player version)
name_original: Alpha Man v Angry Girlfriend (2 player version)
description:
Alpha Man fights Angry Girlfriend.  This version is two players.

Alpha Man buttons:

"a" is left, "d" is right, "w" is jump, "1" is punch, "2" is kick

Angry Girlfriend buttons:

"left arrow" is left, "right arrow" is right, "up arrow" is jump, "9" is punch, "0" is kick
